articles.description: England slide to a dismal 434-run defeat by India on the fourth day of the third Test in Rajkot.
articles.title: England slump to miserable defeat in third Test

articles.description: Follow live text coverage as Sheffield United face Brighton in the Premier League, plus radio coverage of Luton v Man Utd.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up & team news as Sheff Utd host Brighton

articles.description: England must tweak their attacking style if they are to succeed against the best teams, writes Jonathan Agnew.
articles.title: Bazball at a crossroads after Rajkot loss - Agnew

articles.description: Rangers move two points clear at the top of the Scottish Premiership with a determined and deserved victory at St Johnstone.
articles.title: Rangers move above Celtic with resolute Perth win

articles.description: Follow live text coverage as Bayern Munich visit Bochum in the Bundesliga looking to end a poor run of form.
articles.title: Bundesliga: Will Bayern bounce back at Bochum?

articles.description: Follow live text updates as Brighton host Liverpool in the first of four Women's Super League games.
articles.title: WSL: Build-up as Brighton host Liverpool in first of four games

articles.description: Brighton thrash 10-man Sheffield United, who stay bottom of the Premier League and concede five goals at home for the third consecutive game.
articles.title: Brighton thrash Sheff Utd after Holgate sent off

articles.description: Australian three-time Olympic medallist Shane Rose is stood down from competition for wearing a mankini during a show jumping event.
articles.title: Shane Rose: Show jumper competes in mankini

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes says England do not need to change their method despite crumbling to a 434-run defeat by India in the third Test in Rajkot
articles.title: England do not need to change method - Stokes

articles.description: La Liga leaders Real Madrid drop points in a tight draw at neighbours Rayo Vallecano, giving hope to Girona and Barcelona in the Spanish title race.
articles.title: Leaders Real Madrid drop points at Rayo Vallecano
